oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Board of Education statement, 1961 February 8
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Chattanooga (Tenn.). Board of Education
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Statement prepared by the Board of Education in Chattanooga, Tennessee to clarify their purpose for seeking an appeal in the United States District Court decision to desegregate public schools.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Mapp v. Board of Education of Chattanooga; Segregation in education -- Law and legislation
